name: Love Connect
description:
If you are lonely and bored at home alone, little brother, come and play with me. If you win, you will be given the reward that a man wants.

Rules of play:
There are some squares arranged in a grid in the game area, and each square has a different pattern or symbol on it.
Your goal is to find identical patterns or symbols in this grid and clear the entire playing area by eliminating them.
You can connect two identical patterns or symbols by drawing a straight line that can only turn horizontally and vertically and cannot pass through other squares.
Once two identical patterns or symbols are successfully connected, they will disappear and the corresponding square will be removed, leaving an empty space.
You need to eliminate all the blocks within the specified time to unlock a beautiful CG picture, and you also have the opportunity to get random prop rewards.

Props introduction:
Bomb props: Use bomb props to eliminate all blocks of the same pattern at one time, helping you quickly clear blocks that are difficult to connect.
Prompt props: Use the prompt props to get a hint of connecting blocks, guiding you to find patterns that can be connected.
Refresh props: Use refresh props to rearrange the position of the blocks, providing you with new elimination possibilities.
Use these props skillfully in the game, clear all the blocks within the specified time, unlock beautiful CG pictures and win extra prop rewards. I wish you have fun in the Lianliankan game!
